Title: New Fence - Drop your shortcuts here
Desktop Fences+ Startup Tips
NoteContent:
WELCOME TO DESKTOP FENCES +
---------------------------
• Roll Up/Down: Double-click the fence title bar.
• Rename: Ctrl + Click the title bar (Enter to save).
• Search (SpotSearch): Press Ctrl + ` (Tilde) to find any icon instantly.
• Options: Click the '♥' menu icon (top-left).
• Reorder Icons on a Fence: Ctrl + Drag icon to new position.
• Context Menu: Right-click icons or Fences for more options.
 
TIP: Ctrl + Click or Ctrl + Right-click, gives even more options.

Try customizing this fence! Right-click the title bar -> Customize...
